My Crreative Proces

All of my projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that i am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Before I start the project, I like to talk about my project with mentors and get their fedback.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

I Like To Think About The Structure Of The Project And How I Would Lay Out Each Section.

3

UI/UX Planning

At This Point, I Will Design And Make A Project Mock-Up.

4

Interaction

Finally, As I Code. I Stay In Touch With Mentors And Let Them Know Where I Am At And Listen To Suggestions.
